definition: lit. new bud/fig. new and original
abbr. for Xinjiang 新疆[Xin1 jiang1] or Singapore 新加坡[Xin1 jia1 po1]/surname Xin
new/newly/meso- (chemistry)
head of grain/husk/tip/point/clever/gifted/outstanding

sentences.english: Trucks are bringing fresh fruit and vegetables into the city.
sentences.chinese: 卡车把新颖地生果和蔬菜运进都会。

sentences.english: Hua Hong NEC's booth attracted and impressed many visitors.
sentences.chinese: 华虹NEC新颖别致的展台吸引了众多参观者。

sentences.english: I like big manor, likes to easy life, where the fresh air is relaxing.
sentences.chinese: 我喜好大庄园，那边的氛围新颖让人抓紧。

sentences.english: These characters seem to be another new decoration.
sentences.chinese: 这些杯盘里的文字似乎也成了一种新颖的装饰。

sentences.english: Seal using novel double-end mechanical seal structure.
sentences.chinese: 轴封采用新颖的双端面机械密封结构形式。

sentences.english: In this paper, a new optical fiber dynamic pressure transducer is described.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍一种新颖的光导纤维动态压力传感器。

sentences.english: This paper gives a description of a new computer aided cotton distributing system.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了一种新颖的计算机辅助配棉系统。

sentences.english: A novel laser confocal biochip scanner was given in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出了一种新颖的激光共焦生物芯片扫描仪。

sentences.english: Humanized design, novel structure, five super-wide transparent white glass wind shield.
sentences.chinese: 人性化设计，结构新颖，五面全透明超白玻璃风罩。

sentences.english: The Singularity isn't a wholly new idea, just newish.
sentences.chinese: 奇点并非是什么全新理念，它只是比较新颖而已。

sentences.english: Design new products, refined decoration, delicate porcelain, jade white.
sentences.chinese: 产品造型新颖，装饰精致，瓷质细腻。

sentences.english: This chart energy allows you to express your thoughts & feelings in new & creative & inventive ways...
sentences.chinese: 星运使你表达想法和感受时更新颖，更具创意。

sentences.english: The utility model provides an easily opened cover for bottled can, and the utility model has a novel structure.
sentences.chinese: 本实用新型推出了一种结构新颖的瓶装罐头易开盖。

sentences.english: Iris is an innovative sampling re-synthesizer that frees you to create sounds that could never before be produced.
sentences.chinese: 新颖的采样合成器，它可以让你将声音变得可视化。

sentences.english: That facility design is new and original. It is the ideal produce of general sanitation installation .
sentences.chinese: 该设备设计新颖，操作方便，是环卫设备的理想产品。

definition: to hit on sth new (idiom); to display originality/to adopt an original approach
to conform to no conventional pattern/unconventional/offbeat
new idea
having a unique or distinctive style
a pleasant change/a breath of fresh air/refreshing
novelty/new and odd
to display originality (idiom); to do things differently
not follow the beaten track/have an original style
variant of 別緻|别致[bie2 zhi4]
unusual/unique
modern/fashionable
original and ingenious (idiom)/to show great creativity
to make a show of being original or unconventional (idiom)
creative/creativity
concise/succinct/pithy
unique/distinct/having special characteristics
to act cleverly to get what one desires/to get the best at least expense
